title: Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, 1 gallon, Black; low tank indicator; Dish washer safe; Humidity capacity: 142ml/h; Aroma tray; 3 speeds; mechanical knob; covers 320 sq. ft. area, weight: 6.33 lbs
descriptions:
Introducing the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, a must-have addition to your home for optimal comfort and wellbeing. With a sleek 1 gallon capacity in an elegant black finish, this humidifier is perfect for spaces up to 320 sq. ft.

Experience the gentle soothing mist produced by our cool mist evaporative technology, providing relief from dry air and contributing to a more comfortable environment. The Mainstays Humidifier offers 3 adjustable speed settings for your customized comfort, along with an aroma tray that allows you to add your favorite essential oils for an added touch of relaxation.

Designed with convenience in mind, this humidifier comes equipped with a low tank indicator, ensuring you'll never be caught off guard when it's time for a refill. And when the need arises, the dishwasher-safe design makes cleaning a breeze!

The Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier is also lightweight at just 6.33 lbs and features a mechanical knob control for easy operation. Plus, it comes with empty tank protection to ensure safe use at all times. The replacement filter for this humidifier is the BestAir H62.

Upgrade your living space today and bring the soothing benefits of optimal moisture into your home with the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier.

Introducing the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, a must-have for maintaining optimal comfort and moisture in your home or office. With a sleek black design and a 1-gallon capacity tank, this humidifier is perfect for spaces up to 320 square feet.

Experience the refreshing benefits of cool mist evaporative technology, which covers an area of 320 sq. ft., ensuring that your room stays hydrated and cozy. The Mainstays Humidifier offers three speed settings, allowing you to customize your preferred humidity level and noise intensity. Its mechanical knob control provides a convenient and easy-to-use interface for adjusting the mist output.

Stay worry-free with features like empty tank protection and low tank indicator, which keep your mind at ease while the humidifier runs smoothly in the background. For added convenience, this humidifier is dishwasher safe, making cleaning a breeze.

Elevate your home atmosphere by using the aroma tray to infuse your favorite essential oils, creating an inviting scent that complements the comforting mist. The Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier comes with a replacement filter compatibility of BestAir H62, ensuring long-lasting performance and ease of maintenance.

Color: Black | Capacity: 1 gallon | Cool Mist Technology | Low Tank Indicator | Dishwasher Safe | Humidity capacity: 142 ml/h | Aroma tray | Speed settings: 3 | Control type: Mechanical knob | Coverage area: 320 sq. ft. | Weight: 6.33 lbs

Bring the comfort and tranquility of a cool mist humidifier into your living space with the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, available at an affordable price!

Experience the peace of mind that comes with its low tank indicator, which alerts you when it's time for a refill. And when the time comes, simply pop off the dishwasher-safe parts and toss them in your dishwasher for easy cleaning!

Boost your mood by adding essential oils to the aroma tray, transforming every breath into an invigorating scent journey. With three adjustable speed settings and a mechanical knob control, you'll have complete flexibility to suit your personal comfort preferences.

Breathe easy knowing that this humidifier can deliver a consistent 142ml/h (humidity capacity) of cool mist into the air. Plus, enjoy the added benefits of empty tank protection and compatibility with BestAir H62 replacement filters for continuous use. Experience the perfect harmony of comfort and convenience with our Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier.

Experience the gentle soothing effects of cool mist evaporation technology as it enlivens your living space with optimal humidity levels of up to 142ml/h. The Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier is equipped with an empty tank protection feature, ensuring peace of mind while you enjoy the benefits of a well-humidified environment.

Effortlessly customize your experience by adjusting one of its three speed settings using the convenient mechanical knob control. For added comfort and aromatherapy, the humidifier comes with an aroma tray, allowing you to infuse your room with your favorite essential oils.

Not only does this humidifier look great in any decor, but it is also easy to maintain. Its dishwasher-safe design makes cleaning a breeze, while its low tank indicator alerts you when it's time for a refill. Plus, the replacement filter is compatible with BestAir H62 for hassle-free upkeep.

Introducing the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, a must-have solution for maintaining optimal moisture levels in your home or office. With a sleek 1 gallon, black design, this humidifier seamlessly blends into any decor while delivering an impressive coverage area of 320 square feet.

Experience the refreshing benefits of cool mist evaporative technology, which not only adds moisture to the air but also creates a soothing ambiance. Our humidifier features a humidity capacity of up to 142 ml/h, ensuring your space stays comfortable and inviting.

Equipped with a mechanical knob control for easy speed adjustment, this humidifier offers three different settings to cater to your preferences. The low tank indicator ensures you never run out of water unexpectedly, while the dishwasher-safe design makes cleaning a breeze.

Add an aromatic touch to your environment by utilizing the included aroma tray for essential oils. Weighing just 6.33 lbs and boasting a modern black finish, this humidifier is the perfect addition to any room.

Don't compromise on comfort - invest in the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier today. And remember, when it's time for a filter replacement, simply use the BestAir H62 filter for optimal performance.

**Advertising Description:**

Transform your living space into a tranquil oasis with the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier. This sleek and stylish 1-gallon humidifier, available in elegant black, is the perfect addition to any room. With cool mist evaporative technology, this humidifier provides an impressive coverage area of 320 sq. ft., ensuring optimal comfort for you and your loved ones.

Equipped with a large 1-gallon tank, this humidifier keeps running for hours on end, providing up to 142ml/h (27 gallons per day) of soothing humidity. The low tank indicator ensures that you'll never run out of water unexpectedly. For added convenience, the humidifier is dishwasher safe, making cleaning a breeze.

Experience three different speed settings to customize your perfect level of moisture. The mechanical knob offers easy control over the mist output, allowing for precise adjustments. And when the tank runs empty, the humidifier automatically shuts off, ensuring peace of mind and energy savings.

The Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier isn't just about comfort - it also offers an aroma tray where you can add your favorite essential oils for a delightful scent in the air. The replacement filter is compatible with BestAir H62 filters for long-lasting performance.

Upgrade your home with the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier and breathe easy, knowing that this superior humidifier will keep your space comfortable, refreshed, and filled with your favorite fragrances.
